document.topic_text: Comment India is either really short of sporting legends or so obsessed with Bollywood. In the last 48 hours, we have had passionate debates if actor Salman Khan is fit to be the Indian Goodwill Ambassador for the Rio Olympics. Salman's father and veteran scriptwriter Salim Khanhas also launched a scathing twitter war on legend Milkha Singh.
